column5: Hi All, My group is headed to Granite Lake the 1st week of August. Not the best week, but any insights or tips for this lake or lakes like it would be most appreciated. Can you troll up walleyes or should I stick with bait. Any info on the water clarity, habitat, forage base, or other features would be most helpful, since it's a fly in I assume the weight will be limited. Thanks in advance for any help.
